review: We had been trying to conceive since 6 years. With numerous failed attempts we eventually decided to opt for IVF . We consulted with a lot of fertility clinics, most of them were manipulative . They had scared us with suggesting wrong diagnosis and lengthy treatments which would have costed us in a significant manner . This suggestion of wrong diagnosis caused us so much of mental agony and anxiety.  We got to know about Dr.Manju Nair and decided to consult her. During our initial visit her assistant took all our details, noted down all the important points. Dr.Manju Nair went through our file in detail and then heard us patiently, when she understood what we had been through she immediately did a scan at the clinic , during the scan she explained in detail what she observed and discarded all the previous diagnosis suggested by other clinics. She told us to start the treatment on a specific date and convinced with her eye for detail we went ahead with her recommendation . During the treatment she was very precise as to what has to be done and explained in detail as to why she is recommending a specific medication , she was very professional throughout the treatment. After trying for 6 years to conceive and going through an emotional roller coaster ride, by God’s grace we got the good news with the first attempt of IVF with Dr. Manju Nair . Even after the positive result she proceeded with caution , recommended medication and emphasised on taking rest for the right amount of time. We would highly recommend Dr.Manju Nair to all the couples who want to receive the right guidance and treatment .

review:
Me and my wife would like to thank Dr Mannju Nair and the entire team for making our infertility journey success. There is an old saying that "Doctors are second to God on this earth". 
The said became true when we meat Dr Manju Nair and the team at Cloud Nine, Fertility Cetnre in OAR. Thank you would be very small for the miracle that Manju madam has given us.

Her team of nurses and assistants are always well briefed by her for all critical steps for her patients. Now, with her blessings and support, My wife is pregnant of 3 months. 
We would like to thank again to Dr Manju Nair for making the miracle happen. Our sincier thanks to Kavita sister and the team for helping us in each step of our journey. We pray to god for the good health and prosperity for Manju Madam and the entire Team.

review:
We finally got the right doctor after a lot of struggle, Dr. Manju Nair. We conceived in the first attempt with her, despite my earlier 3 failed IVF. We are obviously very happy. But my feedback here is factual so that it's helpful for people like us. We didn't get the information without the unpleasant experience
She is very professional and thorough doctor. In the first meeting itself we told her that time is crucial for us as we had already wasted a lot of time. She explained us that the process with her will have to be step wise, but promised us that we will conceive within this year (it was June'2020) and it happened :)
We had seen 3 other hospitals and doctors. They were either experimenting with us or were new in the field. We wasted money, efforts and most importantly time.
Our experience with Dr Manju Nair was fabulous. Firstly she wouldn't proceed further if she has doubts about the body preparation, (which lacked at other places, as they gave extra medicines to compensate for it) Secondly, for fertility the embryologist team plays a very important role. Dr Nair does only blastocyst transfer that was another factor which gave us confidence. She has an excellent team of embryologists and they gave us regular progress updates without follow up. Her team of nurses and assistants are always well briefed by her for all critical steps for her patients. I would get calls to initiate the injection and scans if those were the deciding factors for the next step
Our FET procedure was smooth. The briefing for medicines and other instructions was done well right after. Infact, my injections and medicines were also optimal. (Unlike in my experience in other hospitals)
We are now pregnant with twins and in our first trimester :)
Our heartfelt thanks to Dr.Manju!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Mere words don't do justice to the wonderful person that Dr. Manju Nair is! She not only makes you feel comfortable with her friendly approach but gives you a clear direction on the way forward. It is never a monologue with her and she always involves your views and opinion at every step. 

She has seen it all but still makes you feel genuinely special and your concerns important. She is direct and transparent in her treatment methods, feedback, and outcome with no false promises or sugar-coating. Despite a hectic continuous barrage of patients and procedures, Dr. Manju never fails to greet you with a genuine smile.

What is most important during this treatment phase is patience and persistence which she always advises. It is amazing how she remembers the case & status of every single patient even after several months. When we visited her, we had no issues with fertility but possible age factors prevented pregnancies from going through. She was hand-holding us throughout the phase and the never-give-up attitude from both the doctor and our side is the reason why my pregnancy went through dispute phases where hope was almost lost.

Another major + point is that for every small query/concern we need not rush to the hospital because Dr. Manju or the nursing staff would quickly clarify this via WhatsApp or phone call. This is such a boon because other hospitals would ask you to email the query or visit them and pay consulting fee just to ask the doctor about some reaction to a particular medicine!

Due to high demand and morning IUI procedures, it is often that you have 15-45mins of waiting time beyond your schedule. So please plan the visit duration accordingly. If one can not have the patience to wait for a consultation, it makes the entire journey even more stressful.

We highly recommend Dr. Manju Nair and the extremely friendly nursing & front-desk staff who were all supportive during the whole journey.  We are grateful to have found such a wonderful person and support staff at Cloud 9 OAR center Bangalore

This place has made our dream come true . 
With the history of 3 problematic pregnancies( 1 chemical , 2 ectopics - one ended up in emergency surgery ) , I was dreadful at the thought of pregnancy itself. The entire process of extraction and FET was smooth and flawless. Also the Anesthesiologist,  *************  ** ***** **** *** *** **** ******* *** *** best at their work . Dr. Manju’s  team of sisters ( Kavitha , Soumya, Nethra , Jaya and Rosy) are very patient ,empathetic and professional . With the team’s dedicated efforts,  I am now in the  second month pregnancy. Dr took extra care to ensure that all was well this time. No words can express our gratitude towards her. 
In all, Dr Manju is the best doctor. She is an angel to all aspiring parents. Just trust her blindly , you won’t be disappointed. . 
If you are  still anxious, my only advice is : 
Keep Calm! It’s  Dr. Manju Nair !

There is light at the end of the tunnel.

It would be an understatement to say that infertility is the single hardest battle any couple may face together, and every step of the way feels unfair. Ours was no different. When we met Dr. Manju Nair, we carried with us the baggage of a failed IVF cycle, broken trust with the previous doctor, and a barrage of unanswered questions. On the 13th day, I had the moment we were waiting for years - got a positive UPT, followed by a consistent rise in HCG. Today, it’s surreal that I am sitting five months pregnant.

If you are someone who is going through infertility, with a myriad of complications, I see you. In fact, I am you. Please trust Dr. Manju. When you meet her, you will find a sense of positivity, happiness and hope for future. The tag line, "Hope is born here", is so much true.In our journey with Dr Manju, she always believed in running the tests and medicine which were only needed and always took us into confidence and explained every step in detail which gave us greater understanding of what was happening and how body is reacting to it. review: After one year of marriage, we started trying to conceive but to no luck. We first visited a hospital close by from our home and after 6 months were told my ovulation wasn't happening right. It was then I was also diagnosed with PCOS. The doctor gave up on me and suggested to see a specialist. I was devastated beyond words. It was in Jan 2020, while searching for a doctor we came across Dr Manju Nair. We were very skeptical of going for an IVF and weren't even sure if that was our only solution. We visited Dr Manju Nair in Jan 2020 and she went through all my previous treatment files. She did not refer for additional test which itself felt positive. I weighed 72kgs then and the first task she put me on was weight loss with strict diet. Doctor was very confident that we will conceive naturally with weight loss. I lost 10 kgs in 3 months all because of Doctor's motivation and constant support. Since we couldn't conceive even then, we went to her and she suggested we do a OI treatment. I was very scared since this was the treatment in the previous hospital as well which failed for me. However, she broke my fears and said 'Just one right ovulation cycle and it will be a success'. true to her words, in just one treatment, I conceived! We are 7 weeks pregnant now. Words can't express our gratitude for Doctor. She is the most amazing Doctor who speaks to the point and is a god sent savior!

review: Like most patients, I too visited Dr. Manju Nair as a last hope  after 8 yrs of failed conception, IVF treatments. review: We were referred to Dr. Manju Nair after I was diagnosed with Sarcoidosis where-in it had affected multiple organs including eyes which at a point of time might have took my eye sight too. While I was under treatment with multiple doctors for the same ** ******** ********* *** ******* *** ***** where-in I had to take high dosage of steroids, I was apprehensive about having a biological child in future. At this dark stage Dr. Manju Nair came into our life and she literally held our hands firmly and confidently to light. Right from getting a genetic testing done (to ensure that the disease doesn't carried over to next generation), listening to all doubts patiently in an around everything be it adoption, donor sperms etc and guiding us through with a smile always. Trust me that smile and confidence helped us sail through the tough times smoothly. After two unsuccessful attempts of  IUI (with success rate clearly explained), finally my wife conceived in first IVF attempt. Probably, it was the best anniversary gift that I could have asked for. Thanks a ton doctor for being there. For all those facing any kind of fertility challenge I would highly recommend them to visit Dr. Manju Nair and let her take care of your worries. Not to forget, the support staff be it HAL or Whitefield or HRBR layout, all of them having been really warm and empathetic in this journey.  Thanks a ton Cloud9 for everything!
